body.p: Nashville, Tennessee, attorney. North Carolina native. Married Margaret Litton Bostick. Father of John Litton Bostick, Mary Bostick, Joseph Bostick, Thomas Hardin Bostick, Eliza Jane Bostick, Abram Bostick, Margaret Bostick, and Susan Bostick. Assignee in Nashville in 1850. Owned twenty-three enslaved people in Davidson County in 1850. Attorney in Nashville in 1860. Owned seven enslaved people in Davidson County in 1860.
